Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Reproductive System Disorder/Female Reproductive System Disorder/Pregnancy Disorder/Ectopic Pregnancy
Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Pregnancy Complications/Pregnancy, Ectopic
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: A potentially life-threatening condition in which the EMBRYO, MAMMALIAN implants outside the cavity of the UTERUS. Most ectopic pregnancies (>96%) occur in the FALLOPIAN TUBES, known as TUBAL PREGNANCY. They can be in other locations, such as UTERINE CERVIX; OVARY; and abdominal cavity (PREGNANCY, ABDOMINAL).
